name: Agricultural Engineering
description: An Agricultural engineering degree involves learning how to apply engineering to the agricultural industry to assist with area of farming including: soil conservation and salinity, ground preparation, irrigation, farm machinery design and production and helping develop more effective harvest techniques.

name: Computer Engineering/Electrical and Computer Engineer
description: Computer Engineering involves both computer sciences and electrical engineering.

name: Computer Science
description: the study of the principles and use of computers

name: Journalism
description: Writing for newspapers, magazines, or news websites or preparing news to be broadcast.

name: Marketing
description: Generally part of the College of Business

name: Mechanical Engineering
description: A Mechanical Engineering Degree involves the design of mechanical systems.

name: Software Engineering
description: the application of engineering to the development of software in a systematic method
